adrFormatAddress: 178 Bennett Ave, New York, NY 10040-3830, USA

originalText.text: Can not say enough good things about Uptown Stories. My son (11) has been in two workshops over the past 2 years and each time he has LOVED it. Their instructors know just the right way to encourage creativity and they really help the kids find their joy and write about it. We are so lucky to have this awesome organization uptown!

text.text: Can not say enough good things about Uptown Stories. My son (11) has been in two workshops over the past 2 years and each time he has LOVED it. Their instructors know just the right way to encourage creativity and they really help the kids find their joy and write about it. We are so lucky to have this awesome organization uptown!

originalText.text:
My son loves his creative writing class. He loves having time every week where his only task is to be creative with the written word. The teachers are fantastic at helping students develop their ideas into structured stories, and also care for the students very much. Also, the class sessions end with a public reading, which is a wonderful opportunity for the kids to get in some public speaking, not to mention the community-building aspect.

Mi hijo ama su clase de escritura creativa. Le encanta tener tiempo cada semana donde su única tarea es ser creativo con la palabra escrita. Los maestros ayudan a los estudiantes a desarrollar sus ideas a cuentas estructuradas, y tambien cuidan a los estudiantes muy bien. Uptown Stories es una adición fantástica a la comunidad de Washington Heights.

My son loves his creative writing class. He loves having time each week where his only task is to be creative with the written word. Teachers help students develop their ideas into structured accounts, and they also look after the students very well. Uptown Stories is a fantastic addition to the Washington Heights community.
